Reference¶

class sample.blockchain.Block(previous_hash, transactions)¶

This is a conceptual class representation of a blockchain block

Parameters

transactions (list) – List of transactions in this block

display()¶

Prints this block to the console

display_with_index(block_index)¶

Prints this block including its index in the blockchain to the console. This method should only be called by the parent blockchain of this block.

Param

Index of the block to be displayed

Type

int

transactions_hash()¶

Converts the list of this blocks transactions to string. This method should only be called by the constructor method

Returns

String from a list of Transaction objects

Return type

str

class sample.blockchain.Blockchain(transactions=[<sample.blockchain.Transaction object>])¶

This is a conceptual class representation of a blockchain block

Parameters

init_block (Block) – the initial block of this blockchain

add(block)¶

Adds an exisiting block to this blockchain

Parameters

block (Block) – The block to be added to this blockchain

add_transactions(transactions)¶

Creates and adds a block from given transactions to this blockchain

Parameters

transactions (list) – The transactions to be added as a block to this blockchain

display()¶

Prints this blockchain to the console

class sample.blockchain.Transaction(sender, receiver, amount)¶

This is a conceptual class representation of a blockchain transaction

Parameters

  • sender (str) – The sender of this transaction

  • receiver (str) – The receiver of this transaction

  • amount (float) – The amount to be sent in this transaction

display()¶

Prints this transaction to the console
